name: Muh. Hardiansah
home: Hi, I am Muh. Hardiansah from Ponorogo, East Java, Indonesia. This is my personal website you are at. Great, ain't it!
about:
Muh
Hardiansah

Web and Mobile App Developer

I'm Ian, a software developer from Indonesia. I'm an experienced software developer with clean code for trending web or mobile apps. I am experienced in developing web with PHP technology using Laravel, Yii2, and CI frameworks.

I am also experienced in developing mobile applications using React Native technology with the same code can be compiled into Android and IOS applications

portfolio.name: Batu Tracking 19
portfolio.description: Batu Tracking 19 is a mobile application for community services, especially in Batu City, East Java, Indonesia. In this application there are features, including a marketplace, maps of tourist and event locations, and public services related to government administration.

portfolio.name: Silampari Smartcity
portfolio.description:
Mobile application for community service portals in an area in South Sumatra, Indonesia.
In the application there are several services such as public cctv, community reports, public maps, commodity prices, news, agenda information, and sectoral data information.

portfolio.name: Kalender Pintar Pengasuhan
portfolio.description: Aplikasi Kalender Pintar Pengasuhan (Smart Parenting Calendar Application) is a calendar application that is used to improve the abilities and skills of parents in caring for children properly and correctly at 1000 HPK so that children grow and develop optimally.

portfolio.name: Mart-Qu Simple Online Shop
portfolio.description: Simple online shop website for grocery store. This website was built using the laravel framework.

portfolio.name: I-Salam Waqf App
portfolio.description:
I-Salam is a digital cash waqf platform in Indonesia.
With the Waqf I-Salam application you will easily make waqf and help people around in need.

portfolio.name: HOMEi Contractor App
portfolio.description:
The Homei contractor application is a contractor application to make it easier for people to consult in the construction of houses and buildings.

People can consult directly through the chat in the application.

They can submit a new project and project budget only through the application and the technicians will come to the site to check the site.

One can also hire a small technician to fix or fix a problem at home and the technician will come

portfolio.name: TIM App - Sales Monitoring
portfolio.description: Realtime sales, warehouse, finance & warehouse monitoring management application for companies.
